title: Fantasy Drafting Animals From 'A Perfect Planet'
description:
Craig Horlbeck and Danny Heifetz from 'The Ringer Fantasy Football Show' talk about their love for 'A Perfect Planet,' narrated by David Attenborough, and then fantasy draft some animals that appear in the documentary series.

Hosts: Craig Horlbeck and Danny Heifetz
